<source lang="xml">
<settings>

<marginLeft>50</marginLeft>
<marginTop>50</marginTop>
<borderColor>#ffffff</borderColor>
<startDuration>2</startDuration>
<font>Verdana</font>
<radius>35%</radius>

<background>
	<border_color>#000000</border_color>
	<border_alpha>10</border_alpha>
</background>

<plot_area>
	<margins>
	<left>70</left>
	<top>60</top>
	<right>40</right>
	<bottom>65</bottom>
	</margins>
</plot_area>

<axes>
	<value>
		<gridThickness>1</gridThickness>
		<axisThickness>1</axisThickness>
		<axisAlpha>50</axisAlpha>
		<axisColor>#000000</axisColor>
        <minimum>0</minimum>
        <dashLength>2</dashLength>
        <axisTitleOffset>10</axisTitleOffset>
        <gridCount>5</gridCount>
        <gridAlpha>50</gridAlpha>
        <gridColor>#000000</gridColor>
        <gridType>polygons</gridType>
	</value>
</axes>

<legend>
	<enabled>false</enabled>
</legend>

<graphs>
	$graphs$
</graphs>

<line>
	<bullet>bubble</bullet>
	<balloonText>$balloonText$</balloonText>
</line>
</settings>
</source>
